meanings.sent1: The man's hinkiest behavior made everyone wonder about his intentions.
meanings.sent2: The detective found the hinkiest clue that led to solving the case.
meanings.sent3: It was the hinkiest excuse she had ever heard for being late.
meanings.sent4: The hinkiest shadow lurked in the corner, sending shivers down her spine.
meanings.sent5: The hinkiest noise in the dark forest made her heart race with fear.

meanings.definition: Hinkiest: most awkward or difficult to navigate
meanings.sent1: The hinkiest path through the woods was full of thorns and fallen trees.
meanings.sent2: She tried to avoid the hinkiest parts of the conversation to keep it light.
meanings.sent3: Balancing on one foot while juggling was the hinkiest thing he had ever attempted.
meanings.sent4: The hinkiest dance move in the routine required perfect timing and coordination.
meanings.sent5: Navigating the hinkiest maze in the carnival was a true test of skill and patience.
